Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg API API Reference

API generated from Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg@2018-06-15.yang

API Endpoint
http://{Controller-IP}:{Controller-Port}/restconf/config/network-topology:network-topology/topology/topology-netconf/node/inetri/yang-ext:mount/
URL '/' code: %2F
Schemes: http
Version: 1.0.0
Leaf Color Code:
   Key  Mandatory  Optional

Paths

BRIDGE-DOMAIN - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/

Update operation of resource: bridge-domain

bridge-domain_schema

bridge-domainbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Bridge Domain Routed Interface TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
Routed interface split horizon groupPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"routed-interface-split-horizon-group-core": [ null ] Configure BVI under SHG 1

          },
          
"interface-name": "string" The name of the Routed Interface

        }
      ]
    },
    : {

No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
Static Mac Address TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET

No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"next-hop-ip": "string", Enable Static Mac Address Configuration

              }
            ]
          },

range: "1..16777215"
 
        }
      ]
    },
    
"shutdown": [ null ], shutdown the Bridge Domain
    : {
Attachment Circuit tablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET

Options:
 none

 shutdown
 
              
"interface-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses on an Interface\nafter which MAC limit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
              
"interface-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action in a\nInterface
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
            },

Options:

Options:

range: "10..3600"

            },

Options:

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

BRIDGE-DOMAIN - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/

Create operation of resource: bridge-domain

bridge-domain_schema

bridge-domainbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

BRIDGE-DOMAIN - Delete

DELETE Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/

Delete operation of resource: bridge-domain

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

in path

in path

"pbb-edge-mac-aging-time": "string", Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
                
"pbb-edge-mac-aging-type": "enumeration" MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
              },
              
"pbb-edge-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
              : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"accept-shutdown": [ null ], Accept Virtual instance port to be\nshutdown on mac violation

                
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
                
"enable": [ null ], Enable nV Satellite Settings

                
"logging": "enumeration", MAC Secure Logging
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
                
"disable": [ null ] Disable split horizon group

              }
            },
            
"unknown-unicast-bmac": "string", Configure Unknown Unicast BMAC address for\nPBB Edge Port
            : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
              
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

            },
            : {
PBB Static Mac Address Mapping TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"pbb-static-mac-mapping-bmac": "string", Static backbone MAC address to map with

                  
"address": "string" Static MAC address

                }
              ]
            },
            
"isid": "string", ISID
range: "256..16777214"
 
            
"pbb-edge-igmp-profile": "string", Attach a IGMP Snooping profile

            
"core-bd-name": "string", Core BD Name
            : {
Split Horizon GroupPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"disable": [ null ] Disable split horizon group

            }
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"bd-mac-withdraw-relay": [ null ], Mac withdraw sent from access PW to access PW
      : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"bd-mac-aging-type": "enumeration", MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
        
"bd-mac-aging-time": "string" Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
      },
      
"bd-mac-port-down-flush": [ null ], Disable MAC Flush when Port goes Down
      : {
Filter Mac AddressPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            
"drop": [ null ], MAC address for filtering

            
"address": "string" Static MAC address

          }
        ]
      },
      : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"bd-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration", Mac Address Limit Notification
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
        
"bd-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", MAC address limit enforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
        
"bd-mac-limit-max": "string" Number of MAC addresses after which MAC\nlimit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
      },
      
"bd-mac-learn": "enumeration", Mac Learning Type
Options:
 disable-learning
 
      
"bd-mac-withdraw": [ null ], Disable Mac Withdraw
      : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"threshold": [ null ], MAC Secure Threshold

        
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
        
"enable": [ null ], Enable nV Satellite Settings

        
"logging": [ null ], MAC Secure Logging

        
"shutdown-recovery-timer": "string" MAC Secure Shutdown Recovery Timer
range: "10..3600"
 
      },
      
"bd-mac-withdraw-behavior": "enumeration", MAC withdraw sent on bridge port down
Options:
 legacy
 optimized
 
      
"bd-mac-withdraw-access-pw-disable": [ null ] MAC withdraw on Access PW

    },
    
"coupled-mode": [ null ], Coupled-mode configuration

    
"bridge-domain-mtu": "string", Maximum transmission unit for this Bridge\nDomain
range: "46..65535"
    : {
Bridge Domain EVPN VxLAN Network Identifier\nTablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"vpn-id": "integer" VxLAN Ethernet VPN-ID
range: "1..16777215"
 
        }
      ]
    },
    
"igmp-snooping": "string", Attach IGMP Snooping Profile Name

    
"igmp-snooping-disable": [ null ], Disable IGMP Snooping

    
"dhcp": "string", DHCPv4 Snooping profile name

    
"mld-snooping": "string", Attach MLD Snooping Profile Name
    : {
nV SatellitePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"enable": [ null ], Enable nV Satellite Settings

      
"offload-ipv4-multicast-enable": [ null ] Enable IPv4 Multicast Offload to Satellite\nNodes

    }
  }
}

BD-STORM-CONTROLS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-storm-controls/

Update operation of resource: bd-storm-controls

bd-storm-controls_schema

bd-storm-controlsbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Storm ControlPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"sctype": "enumeration", Storm Control Type
Options:
 unicast
 multicast
 broadcast
        : {
Specify units for Storm Control ConfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"kbits-per-sec": "string", Kilobits Per Second, PktsPerSec and KbitsPerSec\ncannot be configured together
range: "64..1280000"
 
          
"pkts-per-sec": "string" Packets Per Second, PktsPerSec and KbitsPerSec\ncannot be configured together
range: "1..160000"
 
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

Delete operation of resource: member-vni-static-mac-addresses

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

vni: string
in path

ID of vni

200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

in path

BRIDGE-DOMAIN-MAC - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bridge-domain-mac/

Update operation of resource: bridge-domain-mac

bridge-domain-mac_schema

bridge-domain-macbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"bd-mac-withdraw-relay": [ null ], Mac withdraw sent from access PW to access PW
    : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"bd-mac-aging-type": "enumeration", MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
      
"bd-mac-aging-time": "string" Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
    },
    
"bd-mac-port-down-flush": [ null ], Disable MAC Flush when Port goes Down
    : {
Filter Mac AddressPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"drop": [ null ], MAC address for filtering

          
"address": "string" Static MAC address

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"bd-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration", Mac Address Limit Notification
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
      
"bd-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", MAC address limit enforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
      
"bd-mac-limit-max": "string" Number of MAC addresses after which MAC\nlimit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
    },
    
"bd-mac-learn": "enumeration", Mac Learning Type
Options:
 disable-learning
 
    
"bd-mac-withdraw": [ null ], Disable Mac Withdraw
    : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"threshold": [ null ], MAC Secure Threshold

      
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
      
"enable": [ null ], Enable MAC Secure

      
"logging": [ null ], MAC Secure Logging

      
"shutdown-recovery-timer": "string" MAC Secure Shutdown Recovery Timer
range: "10..3600"
 
    },
    
"bd-mac-withdraw-behavior": "enumeration", MAC withdraw sent on bridge port down
Options:
 legacy
 optimized
 
    
"bd-mac-withdraw-access-pw-disable": [ null ] MAC withdraw on Access PW

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

BRIDGE-DOMAIN-PBB - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bridge-domain-pbb/

Update operation of resource: bridge-domain-pbb

bridge-domain-pbb_schema

bridge-domain-pbbbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Bridge Domain PBBPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
PBB CorePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pbb-core-mmrp-flood-optimization": [ null ], Enabling MMRP PBB-VPLS Flood Optimization

      
"enable": [ null ], Enable MAC Secure
      : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
        
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

      },
      
"pbb-core-igmp-profile": "string", Attach a IGMP Snooping profile
      : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"pbb-core-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
        : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"pbb-core-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration", MAC address limit notification action
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
          
"pbb-core-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", MAC address limit enforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
          
"pbb-core-mac-limit-max": "string" Number of MAC addresses after which MAC\nlimit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
        },
        : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"pbb-core-mac-aging-time": "string", Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
          
"pbb-core-mac-aging-type": "enumeration" MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
        }
      },
      
"vlan-id": "string", VLAN ID to push
range: "1..4094"
      : {
PBB Core EVI TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            
"eviid": "string" Ethernet VPN ID
range: "1..4294967295"
 
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    : {
PBB EdgePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"pbb-edge-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", MAC address limit enforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
              
"pbb-edge-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses after which MAC\nlimit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
              
"pbb-edge-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
            },
            : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"pbb-edge-mac-aging-time": "string", Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
              
"pbb-edge-mac-aging-type": "enumeration" MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
            },
            
"pbb-edge-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
            : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"accept-shutdown": [ null ], Accept Virtual instance port to be\nshutdown on mac violation

              
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
              
"enable": [ null ], Enable MAC Secure

              
"logging": "enumeration", MAC Secure Logging
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
              
"disable": [ null ] Disable split horizon group

            }
          },
          
"unknown-unicast-bmac": "string", Configure Unknown Unicast BMAC address for\nPBB Edge Port
          : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
            
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

          },
          : {
PBB Static Mac Address Mapping TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"pbb-static-mac-mapping-bmac": "string", Static backbone MAC address to map with

                
"address": "string" Static MAC address

              }
            ]
          },
          
"isid": "string", ISID
range: "256..16777214"
 
          
"pbb-edge-igmp-profile": "string", Attach a IGMP Snooping profile

          
"core-bd-name": "string", Core BD Name
          : {
Split Horizon GroupPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"disable": [ null ] Disable split horizon group

          }
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

in path

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

Request Example

  : {

          }
        },

PBB-EDGE-DHCP-PROFILE - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bridge-domain-pbb/pbb-edges/pbb-edge/{isid core-bd-name}/pbb-edge-dhcp-profile/

Update operation of resource: pbb-edge-dhcp-profile

pbb-edge-dhcp-profile_schema

pbb-edge-dhcp-profilebody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

isid core-bd-name: string
in path

ID of isid core-bd-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
    
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

PBB-EDGE-MAC - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bridge-domain-pbb/pbb-edges/pbb-edge/{isid core-bd-name}/pbb-edge-mac/

Update operation of resource: pbb-edge-mac

pbb-edge-mac_schema

pbb-edge-macbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

isid core-bd-name: string
in path

ID of isid core-bd-name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pbb-edge-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", MAC address limit enforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
      
"pbb-edge-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses after which MAC\nlimit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
      
"pbb-edge-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
    },
    : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pbb-edge-mac-aging-time": "string", Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
      
"pbb-edge-mac-aging-type": "enumeration" MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
    },
    
"pbb-edge-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
    : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"accept-shutdown": [ null ], Accept Virtual instance port to be\nshutdown on mac violation

      
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
      
"enable": [ null ], Enable MAC Secure

      
"logging": "enumeration", MAC Secure Logging
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
      
"disable": [ null ] Disable MAC Secure

    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

PBB-CORE - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bridge-domain-pbb/pbb-core/

Update operation of resource: pbb-core

pbb-core_schema

pbb-corebody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
PBB CorePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"pbb-core-mmrp-flood-optimization": [ null ], Enabling MMRP PBB-VPLS Flood Optimization

    
"enable": [ null ], Enable Bridge Domain PBB Core Configuration
    : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
      
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

    },
    
"pbb-core-igmp-profile": "string", Attach a IGMP Snooping profile
    : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pbb-core-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
      : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"pbb-core-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration", MAC address limit notification action
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
        
"pbb-core-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", MAC address limit enforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
        
"pbb-core-mac-limit-max": "string" Number of MAC addresses after which MAC\nlimit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
      },
      : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"pbb-core-mac-aging-time": "string", Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
        
"pbb-core-mac-aging-type": "enumeration" MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
      }
    },
    
"vlan-id": "string", VLAN ID to push
range: "1..4094"
    : {
PBB Core EVI TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"eviid": "string" Ethernet VPN ID
range: "1..4294967295"
 
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

PBB-CORE - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bridge-domain-pbb/pbb-core/

Create operation of resource: pbb-core

pbb-core_schema

pbb-corebody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
PBB CorePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"pbb-core-mmrp-flood-optimization": [ null ], Enabling MMRP PBB-VPLS Flood Optimization

    
"enable": [ null ], Enable Bridge Domain PBB Core Configuration
    : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
      
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

    },
    
"pbb-core-igmp-profile": "string", Attach a IGMP Snooping profile
    : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pbb-core-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
      : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"pbb-core-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration", MAC address limit notification action
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
        
"pbb-core-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", MAC address limit enforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
        
"pbb-core-mac-limit-max": "string" Number of MAC addresses after which MAC\nlimit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
      },
      : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"pbb-core-mac-aging-time": "string", Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
        
"pbb-core-mac-aging-type": "enumeration" MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
      }
    },
    
"vlan-id": "string", VLAN ID to push
range: "1..4094"
    : {
PBB Core EVI TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"eviid": "string" Ethernet VPN ID
range: "1..4294967295"
 
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

PBB-CORE-MAC - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bridge-domain-pbb/pbb-core/pbb-core-mac/

Update operation of resource: pbb-core-mac

pbb-core-mac_schema

pbb-core-macbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
MAC configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"pbb-core-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable Mac Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
    : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pbb-core-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration", MAC address limit notification action
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
      
"pbb-core-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", MAC address limit enforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
      
"pbb-core-mac-limit-max": "string" Number of MAC addresses after which MAC\nlimit action is taken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
    },
    : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pbb-core-mac-aging-time": "string", Mac Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
      
"pbb-core-mac-aging-type": "enumeration" MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
    }
  }
}
200 OK

name: string
in path

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
    
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

  }
}
200 OK

PBB-CORE-DHCP-PROFILE - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bridge-domain-pbb/pbb-core/pbb-core-dhcp-profile/

pbb-core-dhcp-profilebody object

name: string
in path

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

{
  : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
    
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Response Content-Types: application/json

Update operation of resource: access-vfis

access-vfis_schema

access-vfisbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Specify the access virtual forwarding\ninterface namePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"access-vfi-shutdown": [ null ], shutdown the AccessVfi
        : {
List of pseudowiresPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"pseudowire-id": "string", Pseudowire ID
range: "1..4294967295"
              : {
Static Mac Address TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"address": "string" Static MAC address

                  }
                ]
              },
              
"access-vfi-pw-class": "string", Pseudowire class template name to use for\nthis pseudowire

              
"neighbor": "string" Neighbor IP address

            }
          ]
        },
        
"name": "string" Name of the AccessVirtual Forwarding\nInterface

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

access-vfi-pseudowire_schema

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
Response Example (200 OK) 
{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      
"pseudowire-id": "string", Pseudowire ID
range: "1..4294967295"
      : {
Static Mac Address TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
        : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            
"address": "string" Static MAC address

          }
        ]
      },
      
"access-vfi-pw-class": "string", Pseudowire class template name to use for\nthis pseudowire

      
"neighbor": "string" Neighbor IP address

    }
  ]
}

BD-PSEUDOWIRES - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-pseudowires/

Update operation of resource: bd-pseudowires

bd-pseudowires_schema

bd-pseudowiresbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
List of pseudowiresPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        : {
List of pseudowiresPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"pseudowire-id": "string", Pseudowire ID
range: "1..4294967295"
 
              
"bridge-domain-backup-pw-class": "string", PW class template name to use for this\npseudowire

              
"neighbor": "string" Neighbor IP address

            }
          ]
        },
        
"pseudowire-id": "string", Pseudowire ID
range: "1..4294967295"
        : {
Bridge-domain Pseudowire MAC configuration\ncommandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"pseudowire-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable MAC Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
 
          
"enable": [ null ], Enable Access Pseudowire Dynamic ARP\nInspection

          
"pseudowire-mac-port-down-flush": "enumeration", Enable/Disable MAC Flush When Port goes\ndown
Options:
 port-down-flush
 enable-port-down-flush
 disable-port-down-flush
          : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"pseudowire-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", Bridge Access Pseudowire MAC address limit\nenforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
            
"pseudowire-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses on a Bridge Access\nPseudowire after which MAC limit action is\ntaken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
            
"pseudowire-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action in a\nBridge Access Pseudowire
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
          },
          : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
            
"enable": [ null ], Enable Access Pseudowire Dynamic ARP\nInspection

            
"logging": "enumeration", Logging Type
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
            
"shutdown-recovery-timer": "string", MAC Secure Shutdown Recovery Timer
range: "10..3600"
 
            
"disable": [ null ] Disable Dynamic ARP Inspection

          },
          : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"pseudowire-mac-aging-type": "enumeration", MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
            
"pseudowire-mac-aging-time": "string" MAC Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
          }
        },
        : {
Attach a DHCP profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
          
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

        },
        
"bd-pw-class": "string", PW class template name to use for this\npseudowire

        
"pseudowire-mld-snoop": "string", Attach a MLD Snooping profile
        : {
IP Source GuardPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"enable": [ null ], Enable Access Pseudowire Dynamic ARP\nInspection

          
"disable": [ null ], Disable Dynamic ARP Inspection

          
"logging": "enumeration" Logging Type
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
        },
        
"pseudowire-flooding-unknown-unicast": "enumeration", Bridge-domain Pseudowire flooding Unknown\nUnicast
Options:
 traffic-flooding
 enable-flooding
 disable-flooding
 
        
"pseudowire-igmp-snoop": "string", Attach a IGMP Snooping profile
        : {
Split HorizonPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : {
Split Horizon GroupPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"enable": [ null ] Enable Access Pseudowire Dynamic ARP\nInspection

          }
        },
        : {
MPLS static labelsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"remote-static-label": "string", Pseudowire remote static label
range: "16..1048575"
 
          
"local-static-label": "string" Pseudowire local static label
range: "16..1048575"
 
        },
        : {
Storm ControlPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"sctype": "enumeration", Storm Control Type
Options:
 unicast
 multicast
 broadcast
              : {
Specify units for Storm Control ConfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"kbits-per-sec": "string", Kilobits Per Second, PktsPerSec and KbitsPerSec\ncannot be configured together
range: "64..1280000"
 
                
"pkts-per-sec": "string" Packets Per Second, PktsPerSec and KbitsPerSec\ncannot be configured together
range: "1..160000"
 
              }
            }
          ]
        },
        : {
Static Mac Address TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"address": "string" Static MAC address

            }
          ]
        },
        
"neighbor": "string", Neighbor IP address

        
"pseudowire-flooding": "enumeration", Bridge-domain Pseudowire flooding
Options:
 traffic-flooding
 enable-flooding
 disable-flooding
        : {
Access Pseudowire Dynamic ARP InspectionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : {
Address ValidationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"source-mac-verification": "enumeration", Source MAC Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
            
"destination-mac-verification": "enumeration", Destination MAC Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
            
"ipv4-verification": "enumeration" IPv4 Verification
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
          },
          
"enable": [ null ], Enable Access Pseudowire Dynamic ARP\nInspection

          
"disable": [ null ], Disable Dynamic ARP Inspection

          
"logging": "enumeration" Logging Type
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

          }
        },

range: "16..1048575"

            {

              : {

range: "1..160000"
 
              }
            }
          ]
        },

            {

            }

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-pseudowires/bd-pseudowire/{neighbor pseudowire-id}/

bd-pseudowire_schema

bd-pseudowirebody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

in path

ID of neighbor pseudowire-id

Request Example

  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      : {
List of pseudowiresPUTPOSTDELETEGET

No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET

"neighbor": "string" Neighbor IP address

          }
        ]
      },
      
"pseudowire-id": "string", Pseudowire ID
range: "1..4294967295"
      : {
Bridge-domain Pseudowire MAC configuration\ncommandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"pseudowire-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable MAC Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
 
        
"enable": [ null ], Enable Access Pseudowire Dynamic ARP\nInspection

        
"pseudowire-mac-port-down-flush": "enumeration", Enable/Disable MAC Flush When Port goes\ndown
Options:
 port-down-flush
 enable-port-down-flush
 disable-port-down-flush
        : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"pseudowire-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", Bridge Access Pseudowire MAC address limit\nenforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
          
"pseudowire-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses on a Bridge Access\nPseudowire after which MAC limit action is\ntaken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
          
"pseudowire-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action in a\nBridge Access Pseudowire
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
        },
        : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
          
"enable": [ null ], Enable Access Pseudowire Dynamic ARP\nInspection

          
"logging": "enumeration", Logging Type
Options:
 enable
 disable

range: "10..3600"
 
          
"disable": [ null ] Disable Dynamic ARP Inspection

        },
        : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"pseudowire-mac-aging-type": "enumeration", MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
          
"pseudowire-mac-aging-time": "string" MAC Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
        }
      },
      : {

 snoop

      },

PSEUDOWIRE-DAI-ADDRESS-VALIDATION - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-pseudowires/bd-pseudowire/{neighbor pseudowire-id}/pseudowire-dai/pseudowire-dai-address-validation/

Update operation of resource: pseudowire-dai-address-validation

pseudowire-dai-address-validation_schema

pseudowire-dai-address-validationbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

neighbor pseudowire-id: string

PSEUDOWIRE-MAC - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/bd-pseudowires/bd-pseudowire/{neighbor pseudowire-id}/pseudowire-mac/

Update operation of resource: pseudowire-mac

pseudowire-mac_schema

pseudowire-macbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

neighbor pseudowire-id: string
in path

ID of neighbor pseudowire-id

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Bridge-domain Pseudowire MAC configuration\ncommandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"pseudowire-mac-learning": "enumeration", Enable MAC Learning
Options:
 default-learning
 enable-learning
 disable-learning
 
    
"enable": [ null ], Enable MAC Secure

    
"pseudowire-mac-port-down-flush": "enumeration", Enable/Disable MAC Flush When Port goes\ndown
Options:
 port-down-flush
 enable-port-down-flush
 disable-port-down-flush
    : {
MAC-Limit configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pseudowire-mac-limit-action": "enumeration", Bridge Access Pseudowire MAC address limit\nenforcement action
Options:
 none
 flood
 no-flood
 shutdown
 
      
"pseudowire-mac-limit-max": "string", Number of MAC addresses on a Bridge Access\nPseudowire after which MAC limit action is\ntaken
range: "0..4294967295"
 
      
"pseudowire-mac-limit-notif": "enumeration" MAC address limit notification action in a\nBridge Access Pseudowire
Options:
 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
    },
    : {
MAC SecurePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"action": "enumeration", MAC secure enforcement action
Options:
 restrict
 none
 shutdown
 
      
"enable": [ null ], Enable MAC Secure

      
"logging": "enumeration", MAC Secure Logging
Options:
 enable
 disable
 
      
"shutdown-recovery-timer": "string", MAC Secure Shutdown Recovery Timer
range: "10..3600"
 
      
"disable": [ null ] Disable MAC Secure

    },
    : {
MAC-Aging configuration commandsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"pseudowire-mac-aging-type": "enumeration", MAC address aging type
Options:
 absolute
 inactivity
 
      
"pseudowire-mac-aging-time": "string" MAC Aging Time
range: "300..30000"
 
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

 no-notif
 syslog
 trap
 syslog-snmp
 
  }
}

VFIS - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/vfis/

Update operation of resource: vfis

vfis_schema

vfisbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Specify the virtual forwarding interface namePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        
"vpnid": "string", VPN Identifier
range: "1..4294967295"
 
        
"vfi-shutdown": [ null ], Enabling Shutdown

        
"name": "string", Name of the Virtual Forwarding Interface
        : {
Enable Multicast P2MP in this VFIPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"enable": [ null ], Enable LDP as Signaling Protocol.Deletion\nof this object also causes deletion of all\nobjects under LDPSignalingProtocol.
          : {
Multicast P2MP TransportPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {

"transport-name": "string" Transport Type

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
Multicast P2MP Signaling TypePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"signaling-name": "string" Signaling Type

              }
            ]
          }
        },
        : {
Enable Autodiscovery BGP in this VFIPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"enable": [ null ], Enable LDP as Signaling Protocol.Deletion\nof this object also causes deletion of all\nobjects under LDPSignalingProtocol.
          : {
Route policyPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"export": "string" Export route policy

          },
          : {
Enable Signaling Protocol BGP in this VFIPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"enable": [ null ], Enable LDP as Signaling Protocol.Deletion\nof this object also causes deletion of all\nobjects under LDPSignalingProtocol.

            
"veid": "string", Local Virtual Edge Identifier
range: "1..16384"
            : {
Enable Flow Label based load balancingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"static": [ null ], Static Flow Label

              
"flow-label": "enumeration" Flow Label load balance type
Options:
 off
 receive
 transmit
 both
 
            },
            
"ve-range": "string" Local Virtual Edge Block Configurable\nRange
range: "11..100"
 
          },
          
"ad-control-word": [ null ], Enable control-word for this VFI

          
"table-policy": "string", Table Policy for installation of forwarding\ndata to L2FIB
          : {
Route DistinguisherPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"addr-index": "string", Addr index
range: "0..65535"
 
            
"as": "string", Two byte AS number
range: "1..4294967295"
 
            
"address": "string", Static MAC address

            
"type": "enumeration", VPLS-ID Type
Options:
 auto
 two-byte-as
 four-byte-as
 ipv4-address
 
            
"as-index": "string" AS index
range: "0..4294967295"
 
          },
          : {
Route TargetPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"addr-index": "string", Addr index
range: "0..65535"
 
                    
"address": "string" Static MAC address

                  }
                ],
                
"role": "enumeration", Role of the router target type
Options:
 both
 import
 export
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"as": "string", Two byte AS number
range: "1..4294967295"
 
                    
"as-index": "string" AS index
range: "0..4294967295"
 
                  }
                ],
                
"format": "enumeration" Format of the route target
Options:
 none
 two-byte-as
 four-byte-as
 ipv4-address
 es-import
 
              }
            ]
          },
          : {
Signaling Protocol LDP in this VFI\nconfigurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
Enable Flow Label based load balancingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"static": [ null ], Static Flow Label

              
"flow-label": "enumeration" Flow Label load balance type
Options:
 off

 transmit
 both
 
            },
            
"enable": [ null ], Enable LDP as Signaling Protocol.Deletion\nof this object also causes deletion of all\nobjects under LDPSignalingProtocol.
            : {
VPLS IDPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"as": "string", Two byte AS number
range: "1..65535"
 
              
"address": "string", Static MAC address

              
"type": "enumeration", VPLS-ID Type
Options:
 two-byte-as
 ipv4-address
 
              
"address-index": "string", Address index
range: "0..32767"
 
              
"as-index": "string" AS index
range: "0..4294967295"
 
            }
          }
        },
        : {
List of pseudowiresPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              : {
MPLS static labelsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"remote-static-label": "string", Pseudowire remote static label
range: "16..1048575"
 
                
"local-static-label": "string" Pseudowire local static label
range: "16..1048575"
 
              },
              
"vfi-pw-igmp-snoop": "string", Attach a IGMP Snooping profile

              
"pseudowire-id": "string", Pseudowire ID
range: "1..4294967295"
 
              
"vfi-pw-class": "string", PW class template name to use for this\npseudowire
              : {
Static Mac Address TablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"address": "string" Static MAC address

                  }
                ]
              },
              
"neighbor": "string", Neighbor IP address

              
"vfi-pw-mld-snoop": "string", Attach a MLD Snooping profile
              : {
Attach a DHCP Snooping profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
                
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

              }
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

VFIS - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/vfis/

Create operation of resource: vfis

vfis_schema

vfisbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Specify the virtual forwarding interface namePUTPOSTDELETEGET

in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

            }
          ]
        }
      },

        },

range: "11..100"
 
        },

range: "0..65535"

range: "1..4294967295"

Options:

range: "0..4294967295"
 
        },
        : {

          : [

            {

                {

                }
              ],

                {

                }
              ],

            }
          ]
        },
        : {

range: "0..32767"

range: "0..4294967295"
 
          }
        }
      },
      : {

        : [

          {
            : {

range: "16..1048575"

            },

range: "1..4294967295"
 
            
"vfi-pw-class": "string", PW class template name to use for this\npseudowire
            : {

              : [

                {
                  
"address": "string" Static MAC address

                }
              ]
            },

"vfi-pw-mld-snoop": "string", Attach a MLD Snooping profile
            : {
Attach a DHCP Snooping profilePUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"profile-id": "enumeration", Set the snooping profile
Options:
 snoop
 dhcp-protocol
 
              
"dhcp-snooping-id": "string" Disable DHCP snooping

            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}

MULTICAST-P2MP - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-l2vpn-cfg:l2vpn/database/vlan-switches/vlan-switch/{name}/bridge-domains/bridge-domain/{ridge-domain_name}/vfis/vfi/{fi_name}/multicast-p2mp/

Update operation of resource: multicast-p2mp

multicast-p2mp_schema

multicast-p2mpbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

ridge-domain_name: string
in path

ID of ridge-domain_name

fi_name: string
in path

ID of fi_name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Enable Multicast P2MP in this VFIPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"enable": [ null ], Enable Autodiscovery P2MP
    : {
Multicast P2MP TransportPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"attribute-set-name": "string", Multicast P2MP TE Attribute Set Name

          
"transport-name": "string" Transport Type

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
Multicast P2MP Signaling TypePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"signaling-name": "string" Signaling Type

        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json
